text:
i used integrated windows authentication on tomcat 4 and it worked but when i 
tried to use it on tomcat 5.0.28 i get an error when i click on the button 
(HTML page) that takes me to a jsp page the error is:
"The page cannot be displayed
the page you are looking for is currently unavailable.the website might be 
facing technical difficulties, or you may need to adjust your browser settings"

i am using:
windows 2003 server sp1
tomcat 5.0.28
internet Explorer 6.0
IIS 6
creator: joewazen@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text:
Looks like you have a configuration problem. Please use the users mailing list
for help in the first instance.
